question: Okay went to my doctor on the second of this month and my doctor checked my blood sugar metor and saw my sugar spiced up to 158 well I explained I went walking and it went down to 90  well she told me I am doing grear and she is happy with my sugars well since then they haven't been over 100 till today it was 136. I couldn't walk much because it rained. So since I spike up sometimes does that mean its uncontrolled? When I wake up they haven't been over 90
title: when is getational diabetes considered uncontrolled?
